answers.answer: Call your doctor and ask. Dizzyness can be a sign of preeclampsia.
I'm talking to my doctor about my dizziness tomorrow. My head gets real dizzy, my arma and legs feel tingling, and then I throw up. I'm 30 weeks 1 day
I don't experience any of that.. And I don't really feel like it's dizziness. It's just a very weird feeling and hard to explain /: I have an appointment Thursday though so I'll ask about it.

I've done that with both pregnancies and I don't have pre-eclampsia but it is a sign of pre-eclampsia so I would definitely ask your doctor about it. I would feel like I was going to pass out and I'd kind of black out. My doctor said that since it wasn't pre-eclampsia for me that it was probably from not eating right and not having enough water. It always seemed to happen when I was shopping or had a lot to do that day.

question: The past few days I'll be feeling fine and then out of nowhere my head just feels weird. It's like a mixture of feeling sleepy and feeling dizzy. It's just weird and I don't like it, lol. I just fill disoriented. I'm 30+5 if it helps. I just don't know if it's normal or if I should call the doctor.
title: Does this happen to anyone else?
